author: Flo
content: Oh I feel for you having to go back to retrieve your laptop and then being 2 hours late getting home! I think this graffitied wall you found probably expresses the mood you were in, right? You wanted to hit something - like that hand print looks slapped on the wall - and the "claw marks" ripping up the paper from the lower right corner. Let's hope that you'll have no more days worse than this one!
